snippet.title: Nexus Defenders - Narrative Driven Tower Defense Indie Game 2024
snippet.description:
Check out:
Home page: https://sabrpath.com
Steam: https://bit.ly/nexusdefenders
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SabrPath

Description
Nexus Defenders is a story-driven tower defense game that combines defense gameplay with a visual novel style narrative to bring a new type of experience. As the last line of defense for the Nexus, your mission is to orchestrate a symphony of destruction to thwart the relentless waves of alien adversaries.
